main_definition: Sterling is a term used to describe high-quality, British silver coins as well as its synonyms related to exceptional quality or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exceptionally good or noble in character
meanings_and_examples.example: She has sterling integrity and always stands up for what is right.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Of high quality, particularly in relation to British silver coins made of 92.5% pure silver
meanings_and_examples.example: The antique jewelry collection contained many pieces with sterling silver components.
His work ethic and dedication to his job are truly sterling, earning him the employee of the month award multiple times.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Representing a high standard or excellence in a given area
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant has been receiving sterling reviews from critics and customers alike for its innovative menu.
